Package components

Class Truck

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
components.Truck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Node, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
NonStandardTruck, StandardTruck, Van
public abstract class Truck
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.lang.Runnable, Node, java.lang.Cloneable
Represents a vehicle that used for delivering packages.
Version:
3.0, 14/6/2021
Author:
Itzik Rahamim - 312202351, Gil Ben Hamo - 315744557

    Example: StandardTruck("123-45-678", "M3")
